title: Add Replicate API token constant

requirements.text: Add a constant named 'token' with the value 'HIER_DEIN_TOKEN' to the backend main.mo file for storing the Replicate API authentication token
acceptanceCriteria: A constant or variable named 'token' exists in backend/main.mo
The token value is set to 'HIER_DEIN_TOKEN'
The constant is accessible for use in the generateImage function or other backend logic

nonGoals: Adding error handling for token validation
